agents.name: Wallet Assistant Agent
agents.description: Answers natural-language questions about in-game wallet balance, deposit/withdrawal history, and transaction status by querying the backend wallet API.

agents.name: Fairness Verifier Agent
agents.description: Retrieves on-chain randomness seed and duel result for a given duel ID and explains in plain language why the coin flip outcome was provably fair.

agents.name: Match Insight Agent
agents.description: Generates a brief narrative summary of a completed duel including opponent info, wager, result, and streak data suitable for social sharing.
